column1: Several families of Byzantine Greece were of Norman mercenary origin during the period of the Comnenian Restoration, when Byzantine emperors were seeking out western European warriors. The Raoulii were descended from an Italo-Norman named Raoul, the Petraliphae were descended from a Pierre d'Aulps, and that group of Albanian clans known as the Maniakates were descended from Normans who served under George Maniaces in the Sicilian expedition of 1038.
column2: Več družin bizantinske Grčije je bilo normanskega plačanca v obdobju Komnenske obnove, ko so bizantinski cesarji iskali zahodnoevropske bojevnike. Raoulii so bili potomci italo-normana po imenu Raoul, Petralifae so potomci Pierra d’Aulpsa, skupina albanskih klanov, znana kot Manjakati, pa je bila potomka Normanov, ki so služili pod Georgeom Maniacesom na sicilijanski ekspediciji leta 1038.

column1: What were the origins of the Raouliii family?
column2: Kakšen je bil izvor družine Raouliii?

column1: During the mass high school education movement from 1910–1940, there was an increase in skilled workers, which led to a decrease in the price of skilled labor. High school education during the period was designed to equip students with necessary skill sets to be able to perform at work. In fact, it differs from the present high school education, which is regarded as a stepping-stone to acquire college and advanced degrees. This decrease in wages caused a period of compression and decreased inequality between skilled and unskilled workers. Education is very important for the growth of the economy, however educational inequality in gender also influence towards the economy. Lagerlof and Galor stated that gender inequality in education can result to low economic growth, and continued gender inequality in education, thus creating a poverty trap. It is suggested that a large gap in male and female education may indicate backwardness and so may be associated with lower economic growth, which can explain why there is economic inequality between countries.
column2: Med gibanjem množičnega srednješolskega izobraževanja med letoma 1910 in 1940 se je povečalo število kvalificiranih delavcev, kar je privedlo do znižanja cene kvalificirane delovne sile. Srednješolsko izobraževanje v tem obdobju je bilo zasnovano za opremljanje učencev s potrebnimi nabori spretnosti, da bi lahko opravljali pri delu. Pravzaprav se razlikuje od sedanjega srednješolskega izobraževanja, ki se šteje za odskočno desko za pridobitev kolegija in naprednih diplom. To znižanje plač je povzročilo obdobje stiskanja in zmanjšalo neenakost med kvalificiranimi in nekvalificiranimi delavci. Izobraževanje je zelo pomembno za rast gospodarstva, vendar pa neenakost med spoloma vpliva tudi na gospodarstvo. Lagerlof in Galor sta izjavila, da lahko neenakost spolov v izobraževanju povzroči nizko gospodarsko rast in nadaljnjo neenakost med spoloma v izobraževanju, kar ustvarja past revščine. Domneva se, da lahko velika vrzel v izobraževanju moških in žensk kaže na zaostalost, zato je lahko povezana z nižjo gospodarsko rastjo, kar lahko pojasni, zakaj med državami obstaja gospodarska neenakost.

column1: Mortgage bankers, accountants, and cost engineers are likely participants in creating an overall plan for the financial management of the building construction project. The presence of the mortgage banker is highly likely, even in relatively small projects since the owner's equity in the property is the most obvious source of funding for a building project. Accountants act to study the expected monetary flow over the life of the project and to monitor the payouts throughout the process. Cost engineers and estimators apply expertise to relate the work and materials involved to a proper valuation. Cost overruns with government projects have occurred when the contractor identified change orders or project changes that increased costs, which are not subject to competition from other firms as they have already been eliminated from consideration after the initial bid.
column2: Hipotekarni bankirji, računovodje in stroškovni inženirji so verjetno udeleženi pri oblikovanju celovitega načrta za finančno upravljanje gradbenega projekta. Prisotnost hipotekarnega bankirja je zelo verjetna, tudi pri razmeroma majhnih projektih, saj je lastnikov lastniški kapital v nepremičnini najbolj očiten vir financiranja gradbenega projekta. Računovodje se ukvarjajo s preučevanjem pričakovanega denarnega toka v času trajanja projekta in spremljanjem izplačil skozi celoten proces. Stroškovni inženirji in ocenjevalci uporabljajo strokovno znanje za povezavo dela in materialov z ustreznim vrednotenjem. Do prekoračitev stroškov pri vladnih projektih je prišlo, ko je izvajalec opredelil naročila za spremembo ali spremembe projektov, zaradi katerih so se povečali stroški, ki niso predmet konkurence drugih podjetij, saj so bili že izključeni iz obravnave po prvotni ponudbi.

column1: In the north eastern part of Fresno, Woodward Park was founded by the late Ralph Woodward, a long-time Fresno resident. He bequeathed a major portion of his estate in 1968 to provide a regional park and bird sanctuary in Northeast Fresno. The park lies on the South bank of the San Joaquin River between Highway 41 and Friant Road. The initial 235 acres (0.95 km2), combined with additional acres acquired later by the City, brings the park to a sizable 300 acres (1.2 km2). Now packed with amenities, Woodward Park is the only Regional Park of its size in the Central Valley. The Southeast corner of the park harbors numerous bird species offering bird enthusiasts an excellent opportunity for viewing. The park has a multi-use amphitheatre that seats up to 2,500 people, authentic Japanese Garden, fenced dog park, two-mile (3 km) equestrian trail, exercise par course, three children's playgrounds, a lake, 3 small ponds, 7 picnic areas and five miles (8 km) of multipurpose trails that are part of the San Joaquin River Parkway's Lewis S. Eaton Trail. When complete, the Lewis S. Eaton trail system will cover 22 miles (35 km) between Highway 99 and Friant Dam. The park's numerous picnic tables make for a great picnic destination and a convenient escape from city life. The park's amphetheatre was renovated in 2010, and has hosted performances by acts such as Deftones, Tech N9ne, and Sevendust as well as numerous others. The park is open April through October, 6am to 10pm and November through March, 6am to 7pm. Woodward Park is home to the annual CIF(California Interscholastic Federation) State Championship cross country meet, which takes place in late November. It is also the home of the Woodward Shakespeare Festival which began performances in the park in 2005.
column2: V severovzhodnem delu Fresna je Woodward Park ustanovil pokojni Ralph Woodward, dolgoletni prebivalec Fresna. Leta 1968 je zapustil velik del svojega posestva, da bi zagotovil regionalni park in ptičje zatočišče v severovzhodnem Fresnu. Park leži na južnem bregu reke San Joaquin med avtocesto 41 in Friant Road. Začetna 235 hektarjev (0,95 km²), skupaj z dodatnimi hektarji, ki jih je kasneje pridobilo mesto, pripelje park na precej 300 hektarjev (1,2 km²). Zdaj poln udobja, Woodward Park je edini regionalni park svoje velikosti v Centralni dolini. Jugovzhodni kotiček parka skriva številne vrste ptic, ki ljubiteljem ptic ponujajo odlično priložnost za ogled. Park ima večnamenski amfiteater, ki sedi do 2.500 ljudi, avtentični japonski vrt, ograjeni park za pse, konjeniško pot v dveh miljah (3 km), telovadbo par seveda, tri otroška igrišča, jezero, 3 majhne ribnike, 7 piknikov in 5 km (8 km) večnamenskih poti, ki so del Lewisa S. Eaton Trail reke San Joaquin River Parkway. Ko bo končan, bo sistem poti Lewis S. Eaton pokrival 22 milj (35 km) med avtocesto 99 in Friant jezom. Številne mize za piknik v parku so odlična destinacija za piknik in priročen pobeg iz mestnega življenja. Amfiteater parka je bil obnovljen leta 2010 in je gostil predstave z dejanji, kot so Deftones, Tech N9ne in Sevendust, pa tudi številni drugi. Park je odprt od aprila do oktobra, od 6. do 10. ure in novembra do marca, od 6. do 19. ure. Woodward Park je dom vsakoletni CIF (California Interscholastic Federation) državno prvenstvo čez državo srečanje, ki poteka konec novembra. To je tudi dom Woodward Shakespeare Festivala, ki je začel nastopati v parku leta 2005.

column1: An evasion strategy used by several pathogens to avoid the innate immune system is to hide within the cells of their host (also called intracellular pathogenesis). Here, a pathogen spends most of its life-cycle inside host cells, where it is shielded from direct contact with immune cells, antibodies and complement. Some examples of intracellular pathogens include viruses, the food poisoning bacterium Salmonella and the eukaryotic parasites that cause malaria (Plasmodium falciparum) and leishmaniasis (Leishmania spp.). Other bacteria, such as Mycobacterium tuberculosis, live inside a protective capsule that prevents lysis by complement. Many pathogens secrete compounds that diminish or misdirect the host's immune response. Some bacteria form biofilms to protect themselves from the cells and proteins of the immune system. Such biofilms are present in many successful infections, e.g., the chronic Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Burkholderia cenocepacia infections characteristic of cystic fibrosis. Other bacteria generate surface proteins that bind to antibodies, rendering them ineffective; examples include Streptococcus (protein G), Staphylococcus aureus (protein A), and Peptostreptococcus magnus (protein L).
column2: Strategija utaje, ki jo uporablja več patogenov, da bi se izognili prirojenemu imunskemu sistemu, je skrivanje v celicah gostitelja (imenovano tudi intracelularna patogeneza). Tu patogen preživi večino svojega življenjskega cikla znotraj gostiteljskih celic, kjer je zaščiten pred neposrednim stikom z imunskimi celicami, protitelesi in komplementi. Nekateri primeri znotrajceličnih patogenov so virusi, bakterija Salmonella, ki je zastrupila hrano, in evkariontski paraziti, ki povzročajo malarijo (Plasmodium falciparum) in leishmaniasis (Leishmania spp.). Druge bakterije, kot je Mycobacterium tuberculosis, živijo v zaščitni kapsuli, ki preprečuje lizo s komplementom. Mnogi patogeni izločajo spojine, ki zmanjšujejo ali napačno usmerjajo imunski odziv gostitelja. Nekatere bakterije tvorijo biofilme, da se zaščitijo pred celicami in beljakovinami imunskega sistema. Takšni biofilmi so prisotni pri številnih uspešnih okužbah, npr. pri kroničnih okužbah s Pseudomonas aeruginosa in Burkholderia cenocepacia, značilnih za cistično fibrozo. Druge bakterije proizvajajo površinske beljakovine, ki se vežejo na protitelesa, zaradi česar so neučinkovite; primeri vključujejo Streptococcus (beljakovina G), Staphylococcus aureus (beljakovine A) in Peptostreptococcus magnus (beljakovina L).

column1: Lead fusible plugs may be present in the crown of the boiler's firebox. If the water level drops, such that the temperature of the firebox crown increases significantly, the lead melts and the steam escapes, warning the operators, who may then manually suppress the fire. Except in the smallest of boilers the steam escape has little effect on dampening the fire. The plugs are also too small in area to lower steam pressure significantly, depressurizing the boiler. If they were any larger, the volume of escaping steam would itself endanger the crew.[citation needed]
column2: Svinčeve vtiče so lahko prisotne v kroni ognjene škatle kotla. Če gladina vode pade, tako da se temperatura krone ognjenika znatno poveča, se svinec stopi in pare uidejo, kar opozori upravljavce, ki lahko nato ročno zatrejo ogenj. Razen v najmanjših kotlih, parni pobeg le malo vpliva na blaženje ognja. Vtiči so tudi premajhni, da bi bistveno znižali parni tlak, kar zmanjšuje tlak v kotlu. Če bi bili večji, bi količina uhajajoče pare sama ogrozila posadko.

column1: Originating as the Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad in 1999, it pledged allegiance to al-Qaeda in 2004, participated in the Iraqi insurgency that followed the March 2003 invasion of Iraq by Western forces, joined the fight in the Syrian Civil War beginning in March 2011, and was expelled from al-Qaeda in early 2014, (which complained of its failure to consult and "notorious intransigence"). The group gained prominence after it drove Iraqi government forces out of key cities in western Iraq in a 2014 offensive. The group is adept at social media, posting Internet videos of beheadings of soldiers, civilians, journalists and aid workers, and is known for its destruction of cultural heritage sites. The United Nations has held ISIL responsible for human rights abuses and war crimes, and Amnesty International has reported ethnic cleansing by the group on a "historic scale". The group has been designated a terrorist organisation by the United Nations, the European Union and member states, the United States, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Saudi Arabia, Syria and other countries.
column2: Leta 1999 je kot Jamaat al-Tawhid wal-Jihad obljubil zvestobo Al Kaidi leta 2004, sodeloval v iraškem uporu, ki je sledil napadu zahodnih sil na Irak marca 2003, pridružil se je boju v sirski državljanski vojni, ki se je začel marca 2011, in je bil izgnan iz Al Kaide v začetku leta 2014 (ki se je pritožil, da se ni posvetoval in „sovražna nepopustljivost“). Skupina je postala pomembna, potem ko je iraške vladne sile v napadu leta 2014 izgnala iz ključnih mest v zahodnem Iraku. Skupina je spretna v družbenih medijih, objavlja spletne videoposnetke z obglavljenjem vojakov, civilistov, novinarjev in humanitarnih delavcev ter je znana po uničenju spomenikov kulturne dediščine. Združeni narodi so obsodili ISIL za kršitve človekovih pravic in vojne zločine, Amnesty International pa je poročala o etničnem čiščenju skupine na „zgodovinski ravni“. Združeni narodi, Evropska unija in države članice, Združene države Amerike, Indija, Indonezija, Turčija, Saudova Arabija, Sirija in druge države so skupino uvrstili na teroristično organizacijo.

column1: The average Mongol garrison family of the Yuan dynasty seems to have lived a life of decaying rural leisure, with income from the harvests of their Chinese tenants eaten up by costs of equipping and dispatching men for their tours of duty. The Mongols practiced debt slavery, and by 1290 in all parts of the Mongol Empire commoners were selling their children into slavery. Seeing this as damaging to the Mongol nation, Kublai in 1291 forbade the sale abroad of Mongols. Kublai wished to persuade the Chinese that he was becoming increasingly sinicized while maintaining his Mongolian credentials with his own people. He set up a civilian administration to rule, built a capital within China, supported Chinese religions and culture, and devised suitable economic and political institutions for the court. But at the same time he never abandoned his Mongolian heritage.
column2: Zdi se, da je povprečna mongolska garnizonska družina dinastije Yuan živela življenje propadajočega podeželskega prostega časa, pri čemer je dohodek od žetve kitajskih najemnikov požrl stroške opremljanja in odpošiljanja moških na njihove službene ture. Mongoli so vadili dolžniško suženjstvo in do leta 1290 v vseh delih mongolskega cesarstva prodajali svoje otroke v suženjstvo. Glede na to, da je to škodljivo za mongolski narod, je Kublaj leta 1291 prepovedal prodajo Mongolov v tujini. Kublaj je želel prepričati Kitajce, da postaja vse bolj sinikiran, medtem ko je ohranil svoje mongolske poverilnice s svojimi ljudmi. Ustanovil je civilno upravo za vladanje, zgradil prestolnico na Kitajskem, podpiral kitajske religije in kulturo ter oblikoval primerne gospodarske in politične institucije za sodišče. Hkrati pa ni nikoli zapustil svoje mongolske dediščine.

column1: Many machine models different from the standard multi-tape Turing machines have been proposed in the literature, for example random access machines. Perhaps surprisingly, each of these models can be converted to another without providing any extra computational power. The time and memory consumption of these alternate models may vary. What all these models have in common is that the machines operate deterministically.
column2: V literaturi so bili predlagani številni modeli strojev, ki se razlikujejo od standardnih strojev z več trakovi, na primer stroji z naključnim dostopom. Morda je presenetljivo, da se lahko vsak od teh modelov pretvori v drugega, ne da bi zagotovil dodatno računalniško moč. Čas in poraba pomnilnika teh nadomestnih modelov se lahko razlikujeta. Vsi ti modeli imajo skupno to, da stroji delujejo deterministično.

column1: In considering Turing machines and alternate variables, what measurement left unaffected by conversion between machine models?
column2: Pri razmišljanju o Turing strojih in nadomestnih spremenljivkah, na katero merjenje ni vplivalo pretvorba med modeli strojev?

column1: What two resources commonly consumed by alternate models are typically known to vary?
column2: Za katera dva vira, ki ju običajno porabita nadomestni modeli, je običajno znano, da se razlikujeta?

column1: What commonality do alternate machine models, such as random access machines, share with Turing machines?
column2: Kateri skupni modeli strojev, kot so stroji z naključnim dostopom, delijo s Turing stroji?

column1: After World War II, under a Communist regime set up by the conquering Soviets, the "Bricks for Warsaw" campaign was initiated, and large prefabricated housing projects were erected in Warsaw to address the housing shortage, along with other typical buildings of an Eastern Bloc city, such as the Palace of Culture and Science, a gift from the Soviet Union. The city resumed its role as the capital of Poland and the country's centre of political and economic life. Many of the historic streets, buildings, and churches were restored to their original form. In 1980, Warsaw's historic Old Town was inscribed onto UNESCO's World Heritage list.
column2: Po drugi svetovni vojni, pod komunističnim režimom, ki so ga vzpostavili osvajajoči Sovjeti, se je začela kampanja „Bricks for Varšava“, v Varšavi pa so bili postavljeni veliki montažni stanovanjski projekti, da bi odpravili pomanjkanje stanovanj, skupaj z drugimi tipičnimi stavbami vzhodnega bloka, kot je palača kulture in znanosti, darilo Sovjetske zveze. Mesto je ponovno postalo glavno mesto Poljske in središče političnega in gospodarskega življenja v državi. Številne zgodovinske ulice, stavbe in cerkve so bile obnovljene v prvotni obliki. Leta 1980 je bilo zgodovinsko staro mestno jedro Varšave vpisano na Unescov seznam svetovne dediščine.

column1: What campaign did the Communist regime initiate after WWII?
column2: Kakšno kampanjo je začel komunistični režim po drugi svetovni vojni?

column1: What type of housing was erected in Warsaw as part of the Bricks for Warsaw process?
column2: Kakšne vrste stanovanj so postavili v Varšavi kot del procesa Bricks for Varšava?

column2: Kakšne so bile zgradbe, ki so jih zgradili Sovjeti?

column2: Katera stavba je bila darilo Sovjetske zveze?
